response.original_title: Cascade Bigfoot Blood Mystery Blood Trails
response.overview: The Blood Mystery is finally solved in the final installment of the Cascade Bigfoot Blood Mystery Documentary series. However, it is not going to be an easy or a simple task. Investigator, author and film maker Matthew D. Heines will submit the mystery blood to the University of California (Davis) for a Species Identification Test. After that, Matthew Heines will undergo a grilling and extensive polygraph examination followed by a mind blowing hypnosis session. Finally, he will get help from two remote viewing instructors, as well as a professional psychic to solve the Cascade Bigfoot Blood Mystery once and for all.
response.tagline: Who put this blood in the tent?
response.title: Cascade Bigfoot Blood Mystery Blood Trails
